eeth karali watunu kondaya bella depaththen berena hati, hisa osawa balu sruju balma ekata thadawu dethol yuga witharanage as walin wahan wune naha.thawath mohothakin wahanayata yatawannata yana kantha rupaya bera ganna riyaduru - anil thada kala thiringawala prabalathwaya witharanata danenna wune motar rathaya para pura karakemin yannata wu nisa.para pura athillunu tayar wala shabdaya hithata ingi kale awinishchitha maranaya.wahanaye hinda siti aasanaya thadin allagena siti ohuta penune ee me atha watena rathaye lampuwala eliya.

10 mayikrosoft puhunu patamala oba sithana aakaraya wenas karayi eya 6 janawari 2017 "apage karmanthaye apage mithuran wisin apa samawitama winishchaya karanu labana athara, mama hithanne [mayikrosoft sahathikakaranaya] obe kusalatha sakasime awanka dakshathawayata awankawa nirupanaya kirimata saha sama pudgalayekutama laba gatha yuthu de obata awashya bawa penwiya yuthuya.
